languages.text: "Мне и еще нескольким правителям удалось собрать остатки наших уцелевших собратьев и бежать с умирающего мира, но... Крударах пал. И у его детей больше нет дома, куда они могли бы вернуться. А затем темные кузены пришли по наши души. Они истребили сотни тысяч собратьев ради мимолетного удовольствия и поработили наших провидцев для своих проклятых опытов".

traits.locale_text: "Мне и еще нескольким правителям удалось собрать остатки наших уцелевших собратьев и бежать с умирающего мира, но... Крударах пал. И у его детей больше нет дома, куда они могли бы вернуться. А затем темные кузены пришли по наши души. Они истребили сотни тысяч собратьев ради мимолетного удовольствия и пработили наших провидцев для своих проклятых опытов".

languages.text: "Alongside several other rulers, I was able to gather our few surviving kin and flee the dying world, but... Crudarach fell. And its children no longer have a home to return to. And then the Dark Ones came after our souls. They massacred hundreds of thousands of their kind for fleeting pleasure's sake, and enslaved our Farseers for their accursed experiments."
languages.original_text: "Мне и еще нескольким правителям удалось собрать остатки наших уцелевших собратьев и бежать с умирающего мира, но... Крударах пал. И у его детей больше нет дома, куда они могли бы вернуться. А затем темные кузены пришли по наши души. Они истребили сотни тысяч собратьев ради мимолетного удовольствия и поработили наших провидцев для своих проклятых опытов".

traits.locale_text: "Alongside several other rulers, I was able to gather our view surviving kinspeople and flee the dying world, but... Crudarach fell. And its children no longer have a home to return to. And then our dark cousins came after our souls. They massacred hundreds of thousands of their kind for fleeting pleasure's sake, and enslaved our Farseers for their accursed experiments."

And then our dark cousins came after our souls. They massacred hundreds of thousands of their kind for fleeting pleasure's sake, and enslaved our Farseers for their accursed experiments."

And then the Dark Ones came after our souls. They massacred hundreds of thousands of their kind for fleeting pleasure's sake, and enslaved our Farseers for their accursed experiments."

And then the Dark Ones came after our souls. They massacred hundreds of thousands of their kind for fleeting pleasure's sake, and enslaved our Farseers for their accursed experiments."

"Alongside several other rulers, I was able to gather our few surviving kin and flee the dying world, but... Crudarach fell. And its children no longer have a home to return to. And then the Dark Ones came after our souls. They massacred hundreds of thousands of their kind for fleeting pleasure's sake, and enslaved our Farseers for their accursed experiments."

languages.text: «Con ayuda de otros líderes, pudimos reunir a los escasos supervivientes y huir de aquel mundo moribundo, pero... Crudarach cayó. Y sus hijos ya no tienen un hogar al que regresar. Y entonces los Oscuros vinieron a por nuestras almas. Masacraron a cientos de miles por una efímera sensación de placer, y subyugaron a nuestros videntes para sus malditos experimentos».
languages.original_text: "Alongside several other rulers, I was able to gather our few surviving kin and flee the dying world, but... Crudarach fell. And its children no longer have a home to return to. And then the Dark Ones came after our souls. They massacred hundreds of thousands of their kind for fleeting pleasure's sake, and enslaved our Farseers for their accursed experiments."

traits.locale_text: «Con ayuda de otros líderes, pudimos reunir a los escasos supervivientes y huir de aquel mundo moribundo, pero... Crudarach cayó. Y sus hijos ya no tienen un hogar al que regresar. Y entonces los Oscuros vinieron a por nuestras almas. Masacraron a cientos de miles por una efímera sensación de placer, y subyugaron a nuestros videntes para sus malditos experimentos».

languages.text: 「私は他の何人かの統治者とともに、生き残った僅かのキンを集め、崩壊しかけていた惑星から脱出できた。だが…クルダラは滅び、子供たちは帰る家を失った。そして闇の者たちが我々の魂を追ってきたのだ。彼らはひと時の快楽のために幾万もの同族を虐殺し、呪われた実験のために我らの先見司たちを奴隷にした」
languages.original_text: "Alongside several other rulers, I was able to gather our few surviving kin and flee the dying world, but... Crudarach fell. And its children no longer have a home to return to. And then the Dark Ones came after our souls. They massacred hundreds of thousands of their kind for fleeting pleasure's sake, and enslaved our Farseers for their accursed experiments."

traits.locale_text: 「私は他の何人かの統治者とともに、生き残った僅かのキンを集め、崩壊しかけていた惑星から脱出できた。だが…クルダラは滅び、子供たちは帰る家を失った。そして闇の者たちが我々の魂を追ってきたのだ。彼らはひと時の快楽のために幾万もの同族を虐殺し、呪われた実験のために我らの先見司たちを奴隷にした」

languages.text: “我与其他几位统治者一起，尽可能团结我们幸存的族人，逃离垂死的世界，而……克鲁达拉赫陨落了，它的孩子们无家可回。随后，黑暗子嗣便盯上了我们的灵魂。那些黑暗灵族为了一时的欢愉，屠杀了我们成百上千的族人，还奴役了我们的先知，用来进行他们的邪恶实验。”
languages.original_text: "Alongside several other rulers, I was able to gather our few surviving kin and flee the dying world, but... Crudarach fell. And its children no longer have a home to return to. And then the Dark Ones came after our souls. They massacred hundreds of thousands of their kind for fleeting pleasure's sake, and enslaved our Farseers for their accursed experiments."

traits.locale_text: “我与其他几位统治者一起，尽可能团结我们幸存的族人，逃离垂死的世界，而……克鲁达拉赫陨落了，它的孩子们无家可回。随后，黑暗子嗣便盯上了我们的灵魂。那些黑暗灵族为了一时的欢愉，屠杀了我们成百上千的族人，还奴役了我们的先知，用来进行他们的邪恶实验。”

languages.text: « Aux côtés de bon nombre d'autres dirigeants, j'ai pu rassembler les quelques survivants de notre espèce et fuir le monde à l'agonie, mais... Crudarach est tombé. Et ses enfants n'ont plus de foyer. Alors, les Eldars noirs sont venus chercher leurs âmes. Ils ont massacré des centaines de milliers d'âmes pour leur simple amusement et ils ont asservi les Grands Prophètes en esclavage pour leurs maudites expériences. »
languages.original_text: "Alongside several other rulers, I was able to gather our few surviving kin and flee the dying world, but... Crudarach fell. And its children no longer have a home to return to. And then the Dark Ones came after our souls. They massacred hundreds of thousands of their kind for fleeting pleasure's sake, and enslaved our Farseers for their accursed experiments."

traits.locale_text: Aux côtés de bon nombre d'autres dirigeants, j'ai pu rassembler les quelques survivants de notre espèce et fuir le monde à l'agonie, mais... Crudarach est tombé. Et ses enfants n'ont plus de foyer. Alors, les Eldars noirs sont venus chercher leurs âmes. Ils ont massacré des centaines de milliers d'âmes pour leur simple amusement et ils ont asservi les Grands Prophètes en esclavage pour leurs maudites expériences. »

languages.text: "Zusammen mit anderen Herrschern versammelte ich die letzten Überlebenden unserer Art und wir flohen der sterbenden Welt, aber ... Crudarach fiel. Und seine Kinder haben kein Zuhause mehr, zu dem sie zurückkehren können. Und dann kamen die Dunklen und waren hinter unseren Seele her. Sie opferten Hunderttausende von ihrer Art nur zu ihrem eigenen flüchtigen Vergnügen, und sie versklavten unsere Runenpropheten für ihre verfluchten Experimente."
languages.original_text: "Alongside several other rulers, I was able to gather our few surviving kin and flee the dying world, but... Crudarach fell. And its children no longer have a home to return to. And then the Dark Ones came after our souls. They massacred hundreds of thousands of their kind for fleeting pleasure's sake, and enslaved our Farseers for their accursed experiments."

traits.locale_text: "Zusammen mit anderen Herrschern versammelte ich die letzten Überlebenden unserer Art und wir flohen der sterbenden Welt, aber ... Crudarach fiel. Und seine Kinder haben kein Zuhause mehr, zu dem sie zurückkehren können. Und dann kamen die Dunklen und waren hinter unseren Seele her. Sie opferten Hunderttausende von ihrer Art nur zu ihrem eigenen flüchtigen Vergnügen, und sie versklavten unsere Runenpropheten für ihre verfluchten Experimente."

languages.text: "Diğer hükümdarlarla birlikte soydaşlarımdan hayatta kalmayı başaran birkaçını toplayıp yok olan dünyamızdan kaçmayı başardım ama... Crudarach yıkıldı. Çocuklarınınsa artık geri dönecek bir yuvaları yok. Sonra da Karalar, ruhlarımızın peşine düştü. Kendi türlerinden yüz binlercesini sırf bir anlık keyif adına katlettiler ve uğursuz deneyleri için Ötesezenlerimizi zincire vurdular."
languages.original_text: "Alongside several other rulers, I was able to gather our few surviving kin and flee the dying world, but... Crudarach fell. And its children no longer have a home to return to. And then the Dark Ones came after our souls. They massacred hundreds of thousands of their kind for fleeting pleasure's sake, and enslaved our Farseers for their accursed experiments."

traits.locale_text: "Diğer hükümdarlarla birlikte soydaşlarımdan hayatta kalmayı başaran birkaçını toplayıp yok olan dünyamızdan kaçmayı başardım ama... Crudarach yıkıldı.
